briefTitle: ABT-450/Ritonavir/ABT-267 (ABT-450/r/ABT-267) and ABT-333 in Treatment-Na誰ve and Treatment-Experienced, Non-Cirrhotic Asian Adults With Subgenotype 1b Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ABT-450/Ritonavir/ABT-267 (ABT-450/r/ABT-267) and ABT-333 in Treatment-Na誰ve and Treatment-Experienced, Non-Cirrhotic Asian Adults With Subgenotype 1b Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection
summary: This is a study to evaluate ABT 450/r/ABT-267 and ABT-333 in treatment-na誰ve and treatment-experienced Asian adults with subgenotype 1b chronic HCV without cirrhosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks Post-treatment (SVR12)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the last actual dose of active study drug
